comment.author: 16333811@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Flickr Commons, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 14880328@N02
comment._content:
I feel nostalgic for an era I didn't live in
thank you for preserving and sharing history like this

someone said on another picture you don't get near as many responses as you should, but, hey, you're amazing and people are strange. They'll get to appreciate... eventually.
